related_post.text: hi please I'm trying to use websockets in a project and every time the user reloads the page the user's websocket connection changes how could I fix this?

so_post.text: ok the browser should already do that for you but you can make sure: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4812686/closingwebsocketcorrectlyhtml5javascript

comments: Gracelin asks questiona nd Jkari provides SO answer
